question:
A friend you made while you were studing abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might suitable for him / her.
Write a letter to this friend. In your letter
tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves
say why you think the job would be suitable for him / her
explain how to apply for the job
text: I hope this email finds you well. I knew that you just finished a road trip to Taiwan, which should be a remarkable achievement.

You told me that  your business visa was granted last week and had planned to come to Hong Kong in June. I am looking forward to catching up with you when you are here. Please let me know your flight schedule, I will try to come to the airport to pick you up.

Regarding  the job matter, I just got  feedback from my friend, who is looking for a full-time accounting officer in his firm. My friend has briefly told me about their work involved.  Job description as follows: preparing monthly accounts, monthly payroll calculation, fixed asset register, arranging payment etc.

I am quite sure that this job should be suitable for you. This position wants to hire an energetic person, who is willing to provide input to improve workflow. You told me that you had this experience before.
You can give me your resume and CV by email. Thus, I can forward your resume and CV to my friend, who will pass it to their Human Resources Department to arrange a first-round interview.
Looking forward to seeing you in July!
